com.sio.net

接口 UDPTransceiver

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractUDPTransceiver, DefaultA1UDPTransceiver, DefaultUDPTransceiver

    public interface UDPTransceiver

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void broadCast(int port, byte[] data)
      Broadcast data thru UDP protocol.
      void startUDPEvent()
      This function will start a new thread that holding ongoing events in a roll poling.
      void stopUDPEvent()
      Stop the UDP auto-write and auto-read event
      void write(java.lang.String ip, int port, byte[] data)
      Write data thru UDP protocol.

    • 方法详细资料

      • write

        void write(java.lang.String ip,
           int port,
           byte[] data)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Write data thru UDP protocol. Target at given ip and port.
        参数:
        ip - target'IP
        port - target's port
        data - packet of data
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - may occurs if the channel is not initial yet.

      • broadCast

        void broadCast(int port,
               byte[] data)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Broadcast data thru UDP protocol. Target at given port.
        参数:
        port - target's port
        data - broad data.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - may occurs if the channel is not initial yet.

      • startUDPEvent

        void startUDPEvent()
        This function will start a new thread that holding ongoing events in a roll poling.

      • stopUDPEvent

        void stopUDPEvent()
        Stop the UDP auto-write and auto-read event
